assets.prompt: Flat pastel cartoon landscape background (16:9) for a toddler find-and-tap game. Soft sky gradient, rounded clouds, subtle floating bubbles and confetti dots, large clean empty area in center for UI, no text.
assets.negative: text, watermark, logo, realistic, dark, scary, clutter

assets.prompt: Flat pastel cartoon icon (square) for a toddler mini-game: find and tap. A cute magnifying glass and a pointing finger over a smiling animal silhouette, thick friendly outline, centered, transparent background, no text.
